name: Jewels classic Prince
description:
Jewel Classic - Jewel Crush Legend, free classic match 3 puzzle game launch on Android Market.
Swap and match jewels💎in dazzling combinations in fun gameplay to complete the challenge.
The best jewel game, solve puzzles cautiously, train your brain.😌

Features:
●🎮2000+ attractive game modes.
●😘Free download and free play.
●📶No need network, play offline, no WIFI.
●😈Various obstacles to prevent you, blast jewels and break down them.
●💯Enjoy the good mood by crushing gems anytime, anywhere.
●⏳Ultimate user experience, perfect time killer.
●👫Suitable for everyone, more helpful for the elderly to train the brain.
●🏅Multiple game props: use them wisely and more easier to pass level!
●💰Lucky spin, win more free and awesome rewards!

How to play:
📎At each level, you have a specific list of goals that need to be completed.
📎Match 3 more identical jewels quickly and swap colorful jewels.
📎You must have the sharpest mind. Move carefully, break down obstacle.
📎Useful props can help you pass difficult levels.
📎Use your matching skill to make super combinations with spectacular effects!
📎Less moves, More Stars, Higher scores! Crush all jewels!
📎Complete the challenges and try your best to get high score.

This sparkling puzzle adventure will instantly sate your wanderland and craving for jewels quest.😍
Sea world and jungle world could be full of adventure! Follow the prince to explore.🧐

Family Tips:
Elderly people👵which download this Jewels classic Prince maybe can stay them away from mahjong and other casino game.
👉Download now and enjoy puzzle fun.
